0x0013

0000 0000 0001 0011 = 2^0 + 2^1 + 2^4 = 1 + 2 + 16 = 19

0x0444

0000 0100 0100 0100 = 2^2 + 2^6 + 2^10 = 4 + 64 + 1024 = 1092

0x1234

0001 0010 0011 0100 = 2^2 + 2^4 + 2^5 + 2^9 + 2^12 = 4 + 16 + 32 + 512 + 4096 = 4660

0xffff

1111 1111 1111 1111 = -1
0000 0000 0000 0001 = -1 (Flip bits then add 1)

0x8000
1000 0000 0000 0000 = -2^15
0111 1111 1111 1111 + 1 = 1000 0000 0000 0000
